system.description:
Time: 25-RSI minutesRitual: Chant/Prayer
Range: TouchDuration: Cure or Death

Inflicts a painful rash (C7/H2) in the victimâ€™s genitals that first appears in 3 days. A daily Infection Roll must then be made (Physician 3) to determine the victim's fate. The rash spreads and changes to open sores. Each day, a cumulative penalty of -5 applies to the Infection Roll. Patient is cured at H6, or dies (in agony) at H0.
